snippet: Zach Parise, the captain and one of the Devils’ most important players, will become an unrestricted free agent July 1.
abstract: New Jersey Devils captain Zach Parise will become an unrestricted free agent July 1, a notion that he is trying to keep at bay as he looks to lead his team through the NHL playoffs.
lead_paragraph: Zach Parise, the captain and one of the Devils’ most important players, will become an unrestricted free agent July 1.

headline.seo: Stanley Cup Playoffs — Devils’ Parise Saying and Doing Right Things as Free Agency Nears
headline.main: For Parise, One Order of Business at a Time
headline.print_headline: For Parise, One Order Of Business at a Time
